column2: BRIEF-RLJ Lodging Trust Reports Q1 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.47 May 9 (Reuters) - RLJ Lodging Trust: * QTRLY ADJUSTED FFO PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE AND UNIT OF $0.47 * SEES AN INCREASE TO LOW-END OF PRO FORMA 2018 REVPAR GROWTH RANGE BY 50 BASIS POINTS BASED ON Q1 OPERATING PERFORMANCE * Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.45 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
